name: Double calendar
description: The component is designed to select a start date and an end date. And you can also choose `Specific date range` mode to select a specific date.

properties.name: disabled
properties.label: Disabled
properties.settingTooltip: This is the handler to disable the component.
properties.handlerDescription: This is the handler to disable the component.

properties.name: specificDateRange
properties.label: Specific Date Range
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to select the date selection mode in a range.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to select the date selection mode in a range.

properties.name: selectionRange
properties.label: Selection Range
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to specify a date selection range. This will work if you select a 'Specific date range' mode.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify a date selection range. This will work if you select a 'Specific date range' mode.

properties.name: selectedDate
properties.label: Selected Date
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to specify the default selected date. Date format to be specified "year/month/day".
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the default selected date. Date format to be specified "year/month/day".

properties.name: headerVisibility
properties.label: Header Visibility
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to control the display of the header.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to control the display of the header.

properties.name: fromDate
properties.label: From Date
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to specify a start date. Date format to be specified "year/month/day".
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify a start date. Date format to be specified "year/month/day".

properties.name: toDate
properties.label: To Date
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to specify an end date. Date format to be specified "year/month/day".
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify an end date. Date format to be specified "year/month/day".
